name: Chain Cube: 2048 3D merge game
description:
Don't try and hide it, we know you can't get enough fun 2048 games! So don't be shy, do yourself a favor and download Chain Cube!
A whole new take on the famous brainteaser game! Now in 3D with crazy fun physics! The blocks don't stay in place — they fall realistically and bounce off each other if you don't land right!
Gameplay is simple:
1. Aim with your 3D die!
2. Shoot and hit the block with the same color and number!
3. Group together blocks to reach 2048!
But why stop there? Keep racking up points and beat your own record!
Get ready for awesome graphics, an easy interface, intuitive controls, and fun 3D physics! Plus, Chain Cube
is absolutely free! Download the game right now! What're you waiting for?
